label: stat
detail: A block to display stat data about a topic

label: select
children: select-ghost select-neutral select-primary select-secondary select-accent select-info select-success select-warning select-error select-xs select-sm select-md select-lg select-xl

label: drawer
detail: The wrapper for sidebar and content
children: drawer-toggle drawer-content drawer-side drawer-overlay drawer-end drawer-open

label: drawer-toggle
detail: The hidden checkbox that controls the state of drawer

label: drawer-overlay
detail: Label that covers the page when drawer is open

label: drawer-end
detail: puts drawer to the other side

label: drawer-open
detail: Forces the drawer to be open

label: progress
children: progress-neutral progress-primary progress-secondary progress-accent progress-info progress-success progress-warning progress-error

label: fieldset-legend
detail: for the title of the fieldset

label: alert
children: alert-outline alert-dash alert-soft alert-info alert-success alert-warning alert-error alert-vertical alert-horizontal

label: divider
detail: A divider line between two elements
children: divider-neutral divider-primary divider-secondary divider-accent divider-success divider-warning divider-info divider-error divider-vertical divider-horizontal divider-start divider-end

label: divider-vertical
detail: Divide vertical elements (on top of each other)

label: divider-horizontal
detail: Divide horizontal elements (next to each other)

label: divider-start
detail: Pushes the divider text to the start

label: divider-end
detail: Pushes the divider text to the end

label: hero-overlay
detail: Overlay that covers the background image

label: link
children: link-hover link-neutral link-primary link-secondary link-accent link-success link-info link-warning link-error

label: kbd
detail: Do show a keyboard key or a shortcut key

label: loading
children: loading-spinner loading-dots loading-ring loading-ball loading-bars loading-infinity loading-xs loading-sm loading-md loading-lg loading-xl

label: skeleton
detail: A placeholder div with loading animation

label: swap
children: swap-on swap-off swap-indeterminate swap-active swap-rotate swap-flip

label: swap-on
detail: The child element that should be visible when checkbox is checked or when swap is active

label: swap-off
detail: The child element that should be visible when checkbox is not checked or when swap is not active

label: swap-indeterminate
detail: The child element that should be visible when checkbox is indeterminate

label: swap-active
detail: Activates the swap (no need for checkbox)

label: badge
children: badge-outline badge-dash badge-soft badge-ghost badge-neutral badge-primary badge-secondary badge-accent badge-info badge-success badge-warning badge-error badge-xs badge-sm badge-md badge-lg badge-xl

label: radio
children: radio-neutral radio-primary radio-secondary radio-accent radio-success radio-warning radio-info radio-error radio-xs radio-sm radio-md radio-lg radio-xl

label: navbar-start
detail: For the div inside navbar, to fill 50% of width

label: navbar-center
detail: For the div inside navbar, to be at center horizontally

label: navbar-end
detail: For the div inside navbar, to fill second 50% of width

label: collapse
children: collapse-title collapse-content collapse-arrow collapse-plus collapse-open collapse-close

label: textarea
children: textarea-ghost textarea-neutral textarea-primary textarea-secondary textarea-accent textarea-info textarea-success textarea-warning textarea-error textarea-xs textarea-sm textarea-md textarea-lg textarea-xl

label: btn
children: btn-neutral btn-primary btn-secondary btn-accent btn-info btn-success btn-warning btn-error btn-outline btn-dash btn-soft btn-ghost btn-link btn-active btn-disabled btn-xs btn-sm btn-md btn-lg btn-xl btn-wide btn-block btn-square btn-circle

label: chat
detail: Container for one line of conversation and its data
children: chat-image chat-header chat-footer chat-bubble chat-start chat-end chat-bubble-neutral chat-bubble-primary chat-bubble-secondary chat-bubble-accent chat-bubble-info chat-bubble-success chat-bubble-warning chat-bubble-error

label: tabs
children: tabs-box tabs-border tabs-lift tabs-top tabs-bottom tabs-xs tabs-sm tabs-md tabs-lg tabs-xl

label: tab
detail: A single tab button (can be button, link, div, radio input, etc)

label: tab-content
detail: Tab content that comes immediately after a tab

label: tab-active
detail: Makes a single tab look active

label: tab-disabled
detail: Makes a single tab look disabled

label: tabs-top
detail: Puts tab buttons on top of the tab-content (default)

label: tabs-bottom
detail: Puts tabs on under the tab-content

label: stack
detail: Puts the children elements on top of each other

label: stack-top
detail: Aligns the children elements to the top

label: stack-bottom
detail: Aligns the children elements to the bottom

label: stack-start
detail: Aligns the children elements to the start (horizontally)

label: stack-end
detail: Aligns the children elements to the end (horizontally)

label: join-item
detail: Item inside join. Can be a button, input, etc.

label: range
children: range-neutral range-primary range-secondary range-accent range-success range-warning range-info range-error range-xs range-sm range-md range-lg range-xl

label: checkbox
children: checkbox-primary checkbox-secondary checkbox-accent checkbox-neutral checkbox-success checkbox-warning checkbox-info checkbox-error checkbox-xs checkbox-sm checkbox-md checkbox-lg checkbox-xl

label: toast
detail: Container element that sticks to the corner of page
children: toast-start toast-center toast-end toast-top toast-middle toast-bottom

label: step
children: step-icon step-neutral step-primary step-secondary step-accent step-info step-success step-warning step-error

label: pika-single
detail: for the input field that opens Pikaday calendar

label: toggle
children: toggle-primary toggle-secondary toggle-accent toggle-neutral toggle-success toggle-warning toggle-info toggle-error toggle-xs toggle-sm toggle-md toggle-lg toggle-xl

label: carousel
children: carousel-item carousel-start carousel-center carousel-end carousel-horizontal carousel-vertical

label: list
detail: A vertical flex layout to include list rows

label: list-row
detail: The item inside list. A horizontal grid layout to include data

label: list-col-wrap
detail: For one of direct children of list-row to push it to the next line

label: list-col-grow
detail: For one of direct children of list-row to make it fill the remaining space

label: tooltip
children: tooltip-content tooltip-top tooltip-bottom tooltip-left tooltip-right tooltip-open tooltip-neutral tooltip-primary tooltip-secondary tooltip-accent tooltip-info tooltip-success tooltip-warning tooltip-error

label: tooltip-content
detail: Optional. Setting a div as the content of the tooltip instead of the `data-tip` text

label: dock
children: dock-label dock-active dock-xs dock-sm dock-md dock-lg dock-xl

label: dock-active
detail: Makes the Dock Item look active

label: modal
children: modal-box modal-action modal-backdrop modal-toggle modal-open modal-top modal-middle modal-bottom modal-start modal-end

label: modal-backdrop
detail: Label that covers the page when modal is open so we can close the modal by clicking outside

label: modal-toggle
detail: Hidden checkbox that controls the state of modal

label: modal-open
detail: Keeps the modal open (you can add this class using JS)

label: modal-start
detail: Moves the modal to start horizontally

label: modal-end
detail: Moves the modal to end horizontally

label: menu
children: menu-title menu-dropdown menu-dropdown-toggle menu-disabled menu-active menu-focus menu-dropdown-show menu-xs menu-sm menu-md menu-lg menu-xl menu-vertical menu-horizontal

label: menu-dropdown
detail: For the collapsible <ul> if you want to show it using JS

label: menu-dropdown-toggle
detail: For the toggle to show/hide the menu-dropdown using JS

label: menu-active
detail: For the element inside <li> to look active

label: menu-focus
detail: For the element inside <li> to look focused

label: menu-dropdown-show
detail: Shows the menu-dropdown-toggle and menu-dropdown collapsible submenu using JS

label: table
children: table-zebra table-pin-rows table-pin-cols table-xs table-sm table-md table-lg table-xl

label: table-zebra
detail: For <table> to show zebra stripe rows

label: table-pin-rows
detail: For <table> to make all the rows inside <thead> and <tfoot> sticky

label: table-pin-cols
detail: For <table> to make all the <th> columns sticky

label: validator-hint
detail: for the hint text that appears after the input if it's invalid

label: card
children: card-title card-body card-actions card-border card-dash card-side card-xs card-sm card-md card-lg card-xl

label: card-side
detail: The image in <figure> will be on to the side

label: image-full
detail: The image in <figure> element will be the background

label: floating-label
detail: For the parent of an input field (or select) and a span that floats above the input field when the field is focused

label: rating
detail: For a div containing radio inputs
children: rating-half rating-hidden rating-xs rating-sm rating-md rating-lg rating-xl

label: rating-half
detail: To shows half of the shapes. Useful for half star ratings

label: rating-hidden
detail: For the first radio to make it hidden so user can clear the rating

label: avatar-online
detail: shows a green dot as online indicator

label: avatar-offline
detail: shows a gray dot as offline indicator

label: avatar-placeholder
detail: To show letters as avatar placeholder

label: mask
children: mask-squircle mask-heart mask-hexagon mask-hexagon-2 mask-decagon mask-pentagon mask-diamond mask-square mask-circle mask-star mask-star-2 mask-triangle mask-triangle-2 mask-triangle-3 mask-triangle-4 mask-half-1 mask-half-2

label: mask-half-1
detail: Crops only the first half of mask

label: mask-half-2
detail: Crops only the second half of mask

label: dropdown
children: dropdown-content dropdown-start dropdown-center dropdown-end dropdown-top dropdown-bottom dropdown-left dropdown-right dropdown-hover dropdown-open

label: dropdown-start
detail: Align horizontally to start of button

label: dropdown-center
detail: Align horizontally to center of button

label: dropdown-end
detail: Align horizontally to end of button

label: indicator
children: indicator-item indicator-start indicator-center indicator-end indicator-top indicator-middle indicator-bottom

label: indicator-item
detail: will be placed on the corner of sibling

label: timeline
children: timeline-start timeline-middle timeline-end timeline-snap-icon timeline-box timeline-compact timeline-horizontal timeline-vertical

label: timeline-start
detail: The content inside <li> that will be at the start direction

label: timeline-middle
detail: The content inside <li> that will be at the middle

label: timeline-end
detail: The content inside <li> that will be at the end direction

label: timeline-snap-icon
detail: snaps the icon to the start instead of middle

label: timeline-box
detail: Applies a box style to timeline-start or timeline-end

label: timeline-compact
detail: forces all items on one side

label: input
detail: For <input type="text"> tag or a wrapper of <input type="text"> tag
children: input-ghost input-neutral input-primary input-secondary input-accent input-info input-success input-warning input-error input-xs input-sm input-md input-lg input-xl

label: footer-horizontal
detail: Puts footer columns next to each other horizontally

label: footer-vertical
detail: Puts footer columns under each other vertically

label: mockup-browser-toolbar
detail: Toolbar part which can include addressbar, etc

label: status
children: status-neutral status-primary status-secondary status-accent status-info status-success status-warning status-error status-xs status-sm status-md status-lg status-xl

label: filter
detail: For a HTML <form> or a <div> element that includes radio buttons for filtering items

label: filter-reset
detail: An alternative to the reset button if you can't use a HTML form

label: theme-controller
detail: For a checkbox or radio input that must change the page theme
